summary: This mod makes several Dunmer NPCs wear dunmer outfits, adds goods from Morrowind to certain Dunmer traders, and just generally integrates some of the features from the Dragonborn DLC into the vanilla game.
descriptionHtml:
*Dragonborn DLC required*

This mod makes several Dunmer NPCs from Windhelm and Riften wear dunmer outfits, adds goods from Morrowind to certain Dunmer traders, and just generally integrates some of the features from the Dragonborn DLC into the vanilla game.

The mod makes the following NPCs wear their Dunmer outfits:
- Brand Shei (Will now also sell goods from Morrowind ie. Dunmer clothes, food, and drink)
- Niluva Hlaalu
- Dravin Llanith
- Synda Llanith
- Tythis Ulen
- Revyn Sadri (Will now also sell Dunmer clothes, food, and drink)
- Ambarys Rendar (Will now also serve dunmer food and drink)
- Belyn Hlaalu
- Suvaris Atheron
- Aval Atheron

There will also be a Telvanni flag hanging from the side of The Pride of Tel Vos. Dunmer items will be displayed on Brand Shei\'s market stall in Riften, on the Shelves of Sadri\'s used wares, and in the New Gnisis Cornerclub.
author: Rajti15
